mapper.sql: id , parent_id, menu_name, url, redirect_url, `component`, component_name, permission_code, permission_status, icon, menu_type, open_type, is_display, is_route, keep_alive, is_hidden, remark, state, sort, create_id, create_time, update_time
mapper.select: select distinct m.id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.url, m.redirect_url, m.component, m.component_name, m.permission_code, m.permission_status, m.icon, m.menu_type, m.open_type, m.is_display, m.is_route, m.keep_alive, m.is_hidden, m.remark, m.state, m.sort, m.create_id, m.create_time, m.update_time from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id left join sys_user_role sur on rm.role_id = sur.role_id left join sys_role r on sur.role_id = r.id where r.state = '1' AND m.menu_type in ('0', '1') AND sur.user_id = #{userId} order by m.parent_id, m.sort

select distinct m.permission_code from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id left join sys_user_role sur on rm.role_id = sur.role_id left join sys_role r on r.id = sur.role_id where m.state = '1' AND r.state = '1' AND m.menu_type = '2' AND sur.user_id = #{userId}
select distinct m.perms from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id where m.status = '1' AND m.menu_type = '2' and rm.role_id = #{roleId}
